body: @WastingMyTime Is just because she have way more doujins than other characters, dude she have more than 1k doujins, heck, she have more doujins than Emiya Shirou, and shirou most of the cases have to be in the doujins fucking rin, saber, sakura and Medusa in the fsn tags. And yes, obvious she will have more NTR than other characters, remember that NTR is for cucks that like to have their beloveds stolen from then and Mash is just the perfect heroine for this in FGO because 1- everyone have her 2- she's always with you 3- she's loyal and lovable like a puppy 4- she loves you. Other servants can be a good target for NTR in FGO too but Mash is just perfect by peoples how are into it.
@guillerXD but compare to other characters from fgo or any other series, mash definitely feel like she has more ntr doujin, maybe its because she has more doujins than others?
@angelysaras there aren't, is just that you kinda forget the good ones, but the bad ones leave a bad impression on you and makes you think they are more frequents than they really are.
why are more than half of Mash doujins ntr
I've been seeing a lot of NTR on Mash. What a time to be alive :        ^)
